display: Daily - start and join live stream

AME.caption: room url
AME.doc: Enter the full Daily room url for the room a user would like to stream. This should be in the format https://your-daily-domain.daily.co/room-name
AME.name: roomurl

AMF.caption: rtmp url
AMF.doc: Retrieve this from your streaming provider (ie youtube, twitch etc) This should be in the format rtmp://RTMP_ENDPOINT/STREAM_KEY  or rtmps://RTMP_ENDPOINT/STREAM_KEY
AMF.name: rtmplink

AMG.caption: meeting token
AMG.doc: Enter a meeting owner token to livestream. You can use the Daily - create a meeting token action to create a meeting owner token.
AMG.name: token

AQV.caption: Use this action to join and start a live stream in full screen it is a pay as you go feature that requires a credit card
AQV.name: information
